phrases: You are really early, there is still thirty minutes till the arranged meeting time.
Moka-san looks cute in casual clothes too!
It is finally summer vacation, right, Tsukune?
I am really looking forward to the trip.
To be honest, I was really surprised.
I did not expect things to turn out like this.
This year, the newspaper club will have its summer retreat in the human world!
With the amount of people we have...
It is fine, if I am with you guys...
Going with Moka-san and the others to the human world...
This is so sudden, is it all right to be happy about this?
That I was living in the human world until junior high, and I have always hated humans.
Going back to the human world makes you feel...
To tell you the truth, I am still a bit anxious after recalling some memories.
If I am with you, my anticipation will overcome the anxiety!
I will be counting on you, Tsukune.
What were you guys doing just now?
They are only early in such situations.
This is the first time that the newspaper club is going to the human world for a retreat!
Let us get excited and have fun!
His remedial lessons are not over yet.
I wonder how many red marks he got.
Damn it, wait for me everyone!
I will be there in a jiffy!
But I do not think Kurumu-san should be talking about others.
Do not worry about me, I finished all my lessons on time!
Or rather you skipped class on time, right?
The human world... once we pass this...
Even saying I am Back!, like you were a human.
It is because Tsukune stayed in the human world for a while...
Are not you afraid of the human world?
Youkai Academy is much more frightening.
A lot of sand got into my swimsuit...
Oh, so that is what it was.
For a moment there, I thought Tsukune might be a human.
Let us drop this topic and have fun since it is summer vacation now.
Sorry, you are so small that I did not notice.
Let us have a showdown then!
That is just what I wanted!
You cannot use magic in the human world.
What are you doing over there?
I should be apologizing instead, Moka-san.
Even though I knew that vampires cannot go into water.
For more details, refer to Episode 5.
Kurumu-chan and the others are waiting for you.
If you are staying here, then I will too!
Since we are at the beach, you should have a lot of fun.
If you are not around, I cannot enjoy myself!
Are you really all right with that?
You were about to suck Tsukune's blood just now, were not you?!
But it is because Tsukune smells so good.
What will happen if Tsukune faints in the human world?
If that is the case, then I will take care of him!
You are the main because of the problem!
It is such a beautiful place...
Oh no, we came all the way here, let us go back now.
There is no need to hurry, right?
Do not tell me you have not heard of the rumors?
There is been a lot of disappearances occurring on this hill.
Disappearing incidents in a place like this?
Which is why it sends shivers down my spine!
The townspeople think that it is the work of witches.
Rumors say that due to the development plans for this hill,
the witches were angered and caused the disappearances.
Let us hurry up and leave!
They call this place the Witches' Hill.
Legend has it that witches live here!
You really know quite a bit.
This legend is pretty famous in this area!
Your race is the kind that abducts humans?
I guess Kurumu-san really is a fool!
I really hate witches that are not cute at all.
I hate perverted and shameless succubi like you!
You are just an immature brat.
What are you doing all of a sudden?!
Just dropping a basin on you.
I did not ask about that!
Come on, let us go back to the beach.
Sensei is waiting for us there...
I must report this back to Master.
Guys, I will leave the rest to you, all right?
I will go get some food.
When we come to the beach, we definitely need to have some fresh fish!
Fish from the human world are really delicious!
Sensei, could it be that you decided to have a retreat in the human world because of this?
I will definitely make that small witch become one of us.
Oh well, we cannot help it...
Let me lend you a hand too!
But it is a bit too heavy for you...
I will be fine carrying it.
Let me hold one side for you.
Thanks, but I will be fine.
It would be bad if you cut yourself accidently with the knife.
You can watch us from over there.
A kid will only be in the way.
Everyone treats me like a child.
But I can already do things by myself!
Do not show such a scary expression, little witch.
I am Ruby, a witch that lives on this hilltop.
That is right, I am your fellow witch, Yukari-chan.
Why do you know my name?
Have not you been here during the day?
Ever since then, I have been observing you.
Because I never thought that I would meet another witch right here,
Yukari-chan, I want to be your friend.
Since we are both witches, let us get along well!
The fish in the human world really do smell great!
I only wanted to count them, really!
The humans wish to destroy such a beautiful hill.
I heard that there were plans to develop this area.
Yes, that is why I will destroy the humans!
You will help me, right, Yukari-chan?
I have already finished the preparations.
What is left is to execute the Master's plan.
Come along, let me introduce you to the Master!
Let us live together at Witches'
I was worried when you suddenly disappeared.
Do you still plan on desecrating our hill?
These guys are a swarm of magical plant monsters that will ambush or devour humans.
Tsukune-san is not a human that is here to desecrate this hill!
Yukari-chan, do not get in my way!
I will not let you do this!
He is not even a witch!
That is why I definitely will not let you do such things to him!
Nothing in this world can compare to the strength of bonds between witches.
If there is something, then let me eliminate it!
that the people who disappeared were all...
You are just an immature brat.
I am not just a child anymore!
This week's winner has been decided!
Hey, Moka-san did not transform this time...
Yukari-chan defeated them all by herself?
I am all right... just a little exhaused, that is all...
Let us bring her back to the tent first.
I cannot be together with you.
That is because I have friends that are important to me...
Did not I say not to exert yourself and let me carry you?
A witch's self-regeneration is very powerful.
You are not honest with yourself at all!
Who is the one not being honest?
Yukari-chan looks like she is fine now.
It is great that you are both okay.
After you left to find her, you did not come back either...
I was worried that something happened to you two...
Ever since summer vacation started, we are finally alone...
I must bring Yukari-chan back no matter what.
That is because it is my...
You dare do that to Tsukune!
I made shaved ice for you guys.
It is cold and my head is freezing!
This is not the time for that!
Next week's situation will be more serious!
Next week, Sunflower and A Vampire,
